name: Living Pages - Children's Interactive Book
description:
Living Pages is a customizable interactive book, so you make reading time a little more special. With each page being interactable, it will help engage your young ones, making reading a fun, and keeping those hardcore gaming parents logged into Steam!

Reading is about spending quality fun time together. It doesn't need to feel like a job.



With a turn of a page, we're all grown up.

Enjoy reading again, to make memories that last a lifetime!
